text: Excellent location with good access to public transport. Rooms are not equipped with fridges
The Spa is amazing Quite location but easily access to public transport Close to the beach
Friendly staff comfortable accommodation Good access to public transport to the city centre the airport
Very relaxing spacious great atmosphere. Just a bit far from the center but good access to public transport
Very luxurious room for the price nice breakfast buffet good access to public transport. The dolls outside our room in the corridor were slightly creepy
Friendly staff and a good location near public transport. Beds a little to soft No view
Good location good access to public transport to city Good size rooms Internet OK Very comfortable Adequate car parking in street. MInimul crockery and no good sized mugs or cups
The hotel was in a good neighborhood near public transportation We easily walked to the Louvre It is a good central location

Excellent hotel great breakfast cozy and spacey rooms good bar Reasonable proximity by foot to the city center good access to public transport Magnificent view from 12 floor. Paying after every beer or snack I had at the bar was pretty annoying
Excellent Interiors. Location is not good and difficult to approach by public transport But they provide a free shuttle to the nearest station
Well located near public transport stops and a 20 minute walk to the historic centre. The hotel is on a busy road and rooms at the front suffer traffic noise
good hotel near public transport. hotel restaurant was shut at the weekend as are local places to eat due to hotel being in banking district in London
Good location near public transports and only a short walk 20 min from the city center Very quiet and confortable Staff always happy to help. Nothing really bad
Hospitality and very near to Public transport and hygiene Food
Location is very near to public transport n shops Staff was helpful. Parking is very expensive
Property was centrally located near major public transportation hub Staff were friendly helpful and efficient
Near to public transport and inner city. Thin walls even chat from next room was audible
Near the public transport station and halal restaurant. Staff not very cooperative maybe due to language barier
The buffet breakfast was quite good and access to public transport was most convenient. More vegetarian options on the menu would be nice
the spacious rooms nice bed and the breakfast different concept but quite nice and perfect location near to public transport
